Description:
Discover how Fabric IQ transforms your data into a live, semantic model of your business. Learn how teams and AI agents can collaborate from a shared understanding of entities, relationships, and rules -- enabling real-time insights, smarter decisions, and autonomous operations. See how Fabric IQ works seamlessly within Microsoft Fabric to power the next generation of intelligent enterprise.

BRK222 | English (US) | Unify your data platform, Microsoft Fabric Breakout | Advanced (300) #MSIgnite, #Unifyyourdataplatform

Chapters: 0:00 - AI transformation and the importance of data 00:13:34 - Explaining power ontology and integration of dispersed datasets 00:15:09 - Improvements with ontology for unified grid analysis 00:25:44 - Using Ontology for Insights, Geospatial and Rule Automation 00:28:09 - Automating Operational Actions via Ontology Rules 00:30:25 - Transition to AI Integration within Fabric IQ 00:33:11 - Demonstration of business ontology integration for airport runway task management 00:36:24 - Operations Agent demonstration: alerting, reasoning, and recommending actions in Microsoft Teams 00:40:59 - Kyndryl demo: Agentic AI Digital Trust applied to data center operations
Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Microsoft Fabric IQ: Turning unified data into unified intelligence | BRK222
